    • makeSale

      public void makeSale​(int customerID, Product orderProduct, java.lang.String customerAddress, java.lang.String customerPhone)
      When the customer shopping at the store, employee make the sale. If customer does not exist in the system, system gives the warning.
      Parameters:
      customerID - Customer ID of the shopping customer
      orderProduct - Purchased product object
      customerAddress - Customer address
      customerPhone - Customer phone number

    • addPreviousOrder

      public void addPreviousOrder​(Product orderProduct, int customerID)
      If the sale is made, previous orders are added.
      Parameters:
      orderProduct - Product will be added.
      customerID - Customer ID who bought the product

    • accessThePastOrder

      public void accessThePastOrder​(Customer customerObj)
      It shows the products that the customer has purchased in the past.
      Parameters:
      customerObj - Customer to check past orders

    • getPreviousOrder

      public void getPreviousOrder​(int customerID)
      It checks whether the customer is registered in the system and if it is, it shows the customer's previous orders.
      Parameters:
      customerID - customer id whose previous orders will be displayed
